snippet: Alex Rodriguez said he wanted a positive welcome from the fans in his 2013 home debut.
abstract: New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez says he wants positive welcome from fans at his 2013 home debut;  will also be his first game at home since Major League Baseball issued a 211-game suspension for using performance-enhancing drugs.
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez said he wanted a positive welcome from the fans in his 2013 home debut.

headline.main: Rodriguez Hoping for an Unlikely Reception
